text: For Whom the Bell Tolls is a 1943 American romantic war drama movie directed by Sam Wood and was based on the 1940 novel of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. It stars Gary Cooper, Ingrid Bergman, Akim Tamiroff, Vladimir Sokoloff, Arturo de CÃ³rdova, Katina Paxinou, Joseph Calleia, Frank Puglia and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 9 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1944. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 romance movies Category:1943 war movies Category:1940s romantic drama movies Category:1940s epic movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: For Whom the Bell Tolls (movie)
